front.title: Management Information Base for IP Version 6

abstract.t: This paper is intended to serve as a framework for definition of IPv6 MIB objects. This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the IPv6-based internets. This document specifies a MIB module in a manner that is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI, and semantically identical to the peer SNMPv1 definitions.
